casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 20, 2013

[Cite as 12/20/2013 Case Announcements #2, 2013-Ohio-5634.]

MISCELLANEOUS ORDERS

In re Disqualification of Jacob.

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that Harry J. Jacob III, Attorney Registration No. 0008620, is hereby disqualified from acting as a judge pursuant to Gov.Jud.R. III(6)(A). It is further ordered that he shall remain disqualified while any and all indictments filed in the Cuyahoga County Court of Common Pleas are pending and until further order of this court.
